game.shortDescription: 독특하고 대범한 능력을 이용해 친구들과 대결하는 로컬/온라인 게임입니다. 수축 광선, 블랙홀 생성, 시간 정지등을 선택하거나 지형물에 로켓 엔진을 장착해 날려 보낼 수도 있습니다. 시너지가 좋은 조합을 선택해 라운드에서 승리하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A couch/online game where you battle your friends with unique and wild abilities. There are many choices such as a shrink ray, creating black holes, stopping time and attaching a rocket engine to the stage to send it flying. Choose a combination that synergizes well to win the round!

reviewHighlights.text: Closest I've ever gotten to feeling like a kid playing some xbox live arcade game in a party with my friends after school. Idk how in God's green gass...
This would be so fun if there was 8 player local multiplayer. Not saying it isn’t already fun
